channel.title: Zachary Lanz - CTI Insights
channel.description: Cyber Threat Intelligence insights, program development strategies, and geopolitical threat analysis from Zachary Lanz.

item.title: Getting Started in Cyber Threat Intelligence
item.description: A practical guide for aspiring CTI professionals navigating the path from curiosity to career. Cyber Threat Intelligence has become one of the most critical disciplines in cybersecurity. If you're considering a career in CTI, here's what you need to know to get started.
item.author: zacharylanz@live.com (Zachary Lanz)
